article:
On October 31st, 2003, young surfer, Bethany Hamilton suffered a big loss. It was Halloween morning in Hawaii and a(n)   _   day for surfing. Bethany went surfing with her best friend. She was catching great waves and   _   her life changed in a second. She got   _   by a 14-foot tiger shark, which bit her just 4 inches  _    her left shoulder and took the rest of her arm off! She never   _   that to happen to her on a sunny Halloween! 
  Bethany was   _  on being a professional surfer before her accident in the waves. She  took up  surfing at an early age and her whole family were surfers. Bethany only      _   14 on February 8th, 2004, so it was a young age to have something   _     bad happen to someone.
  Bethany Hamilton,  _   , showed that she was a true hero by saving her life. Her life was   at risk   when the tiger shark bit her arm completely off and her  _      helped her get to safety and she was successful. She  _   overcame the loss of her left arm and within a month she rose to the   _  of going surfing in the ocean      once again  ! 
  She is now a role model to many people for what she has done. She turned a  _      into a positive, which many people can't do! She remained positive and  _  to go forward with her dream. She is   _   a survivor hero and is keeping her surfing career alive as well. She   goes back   to surfing with only one arm, and that is amazing!      As a result   , millions of people are inspired to try to find something good in something that only seems bad.
